titles.title: American Samoa Possession Tax Credit Act of 2003
To extend the possession tax credit with respect to American Samoa an additional 10 years.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/25/2003--Introduced. American Samoa Possession Tax Credit Act of 2003 - Amends Internal Revenue Code provisions to extend the possession tax credit, with respect to American Samoa, until December 31, 2015.
